title: E-Learning Course for Enhancing Practical Mathematics Competencies for Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and fundamental mathematical concepts relevant to workplace tasks
context.additional_context: Emphasizes problem-solving competencies for mathematical challenges arising in daily tasks to improve workplace efficiency for practicing professionals

learning_goals: Learners can perform ratio calculations and statistical interpretations required for financial report analysis at a 90% accuracy level
Learners can design and execute budgeting and resource allocation optimization projects using real-world business data
Learners can accurately interpret technical documents encountered in work settings by applying unit conversion and engineering notation
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
